titleStmt.title: A funeral sermon on the death of that pious gentlewoman Mrs. Judith Hamond Late wife of the Reverend Mr. George Hamond, minister of the Gospel in London. By John Howe, minister of the same Gospel.
titleStmt.author: Howe, John, 1630-1705.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Tho. Parkhurst, at the Bible and Three Crowns at the lower end of Cheapside, near Mercers Chappel,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: the lower end of Cheapside, near Mercers Chappel
